web_snippets: Kevin Gwynn White co-founded Exbo Group in 2017. He has been the acting chief financial officer of over 20 growth stage companies.
Exbo Group's Co-Founder and Managing Director, Kevin Gwynn White, recently joined The Sharkpreneur Podcast with Seth Greene.
